description: This is a Java source file defining the UserService class, which manages user data by interacting with the UserRepository, mapping entities to DTOs, and handling exceptions when users are not found.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: Service class responsible for user-related operations, including reading user data by identification and retrieving paginated lists of users.

methods.name: readUser
methods.description: Retrieves a user by their identification number, throws EntityNotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: readUsers
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users.
